summary: Diff largely implements a cohesive responsive UI refresh via shared Tailwind/CSS variable tokens (light/dark), consistent page composition (PageHeader/EmptyState), responsive header and horizontally-scrollable dashboard tabs, and polished cards/dialogs/forms across major tabs. One notable unrequested addition is a branded attribution footer/link.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new attribution/footer with a caffeine.ai external link and branding content (including a heart icon and Â© 2026 text).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on applying a cohesive, responsive modern UI theme and polishing existing UI; it does not request adding new branding/attribution content or new external links.
